list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: scratch or grope around with one's fingers to find, collect, or hold on to something.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: she scrabbled at the grassy slope, desperate for a firm grip
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Cô scrabbled ở độ dốc cỏ, tuyệt vọng cho một nắm chắc

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: an act of scratching or scrambling for something.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: he heard the scrabble of claws behind him
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Anh nghe thấy tiếng vuốt vuốt đằng sau anh.

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a board game in which players use lettered tiles to create words in a crossword fashion.
